abstract: Kit Eaton App Smart column surveys trends that will shape apps in 2016; holds simplicity will be watchword, though trend may not apply to messaging apps.
lead_paragraph: Apps are becoming more simply designed, single-purpose, wearable and very aware of your location. Look for more of that in 2016.

headline.main: Video Feature: The Mood in 2016: Sleek and to the Point
headline.print_headline: The Mood in 2016: Sleek and to the Point

snippet: Apps are becoming more simply designed, single-purpose, wearable and very aware of your location. Look for more of that in 2016.
